title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his daughter according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his daughter has many meanings and interpretations that differed depending on the person of the beholder, his circumstances, and the events around him, which prompted us to present what was said about this dream by interpretation scholars to resolve the questions that were raised of this kind. As much as possible.Interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his daughter: A dream about a father hitting his daughter in a dream is considered an interpretation of what this father really wants to implement on earth to discipline her. The good desires and developments that happen to her, her disobedience and scandalous actions, and his willingness to correct her behavior. Dreaming about a father hitting his daughter with a piece of wood is evidence of the academic and scientific excellence she obtains, which helps her achieve her ambitions. He wants to control her, but he must give her a degree of freedom and self-confidence so that she does not lose it, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his daughter in Ibn Sirin. A dream about a father hitting his daughter in Ibn Sirin, if it is in his hand, shows the benefits that the girl gets from her father and the positive transformations that occur In her life, it can also symbolize the estrangement between father and daughter. . And her lack of self-control, so she needs to confront this abnormal situation and start getting closer and giving her more love and attention. A father’s dream of beating his daughter in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is a sign of his love and fear for her, and it could also be a sign, if it is with a stick, that he has broken many promises. Of the promises he had. This has already happened, and this may lead to the dissatisfaction and rejection of many of the actions that God knows best within this father. Interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his unmarried daughter. A dream about a father hitting his unmarried daughter indicates closeness and understanding between them, but if the beating is on her face, This is evidence of the progress of those who are associated with it with prestige and justice, while they are ignorant. From this to the future. The dream of a father hitting his unmarried daughter if the shoe is an indication of the anger that he carries inside him regarding the dishonorable acts that he commits and that are not subject to his approval. A warning bell to stop what she is doing, which brings her evil and evil, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of a dead father beating his unmarried daughter. A dream of a deceased father beating his unmarried daughter is a sign of the profits he makes from someone close to her. He is pursuing her out of ambitions and goals, and it can serve as a warning bell about the sins he is committing, so he should repent before it is too late. Interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his married daughter: A dream about a father hitting his married daughter symbolizes instability and constant disagreement with her partner because of what he does, gifts and blessings. A father’s dream of beating his married daughter with a wooden stick is a sign of deception and hypocrisy surrounding her, but if it was by hand, it is a sign of the material and moral support that her father provides her at this crucial stage. Her life is dominated by hardship and lack of status, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his pregnant daughter. A dream about a father hitting his pregnant daughter indicates the suffering and pain that this woman suffers during pregnancy, so she must ask God for help.

title: Dreams that indicate envy and evil eye

preview.html: Dreams that indicate envy and the evil eye: Envy is one of the things that cause stress and anxiety to a person, especially when he sees envy in a dream. Dreams that show envy and the evil eye can be identified as follows: Envy is one of the annoying and hateful things that causes stress and anxiety in the sufferer and changes his lifestyle. Feel Many people know that there are many changes occurring in their daily lives, and it can be a bit strange, and mostly the changes and signs are physical. Affected people can see envy in a dream, which many interpreters and experts interpret as real envy that afflicts the dreamer. Many people wonder about the signs that confirm the presence of envy by seeing it in a dream, so that the person tries to protect himself and get rid of this envy. Signs of envy in a dream There are many signs that when seen in a dream confirm the presence of envy in the dreamer’s life, and these signs can be recognized as follows: Envy is not a myth, but rather one of the annoying things that can afflict a person, sometimes changing his lifestyle, and in some cases the situation is difficult and severely affected. Envy is mentioned in many heavenly religions, and the true Islamic religion worked to warn against it, as the Messenger of God, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, said. May God bless him and grant him peace in his noble hadith: “The evil eye is a right.” Since the jealous person feels exhausted and tired in public and real life, he does not want to carry out his daily tasks and his mood is somewhat bad most of the time. The jealous person longs for isolation and distance from people. And he does not want to deal with anyone while he is in a state of fatigue and general weakness. The signs that he receives in a dream are a warning to him to work on taking the necessary steps to quickly overcome this crisis, as well as to begin treatment. Among the signs that may indicate the presence of envy in the dreamer’s life is to see A person sees the eye in his dream or he sees the letter “the eye.” When a person sees in a dream that he is running away and looks back and sees a great darkness, or he may see a dark black animal, or he sees a person watching him and he cannot recognize the person. In the case of seeing only the eye in the dream Without the presence of other symbols, this means that the dreamer will be exposed to serious damage and this damage may reach death, and God Almighty. When we see a well in a dream, it is one of the signs that largely indicates the presence of envy, and this was based on the story of our master Joseph, peace be upon him, and his brothers. When they were. They were blinded by envy and hatred towards him and threw him into the well. If you see a circle or a circular shape in your dream, this is considered a sign of envy. When one sees a thief in a dream, this indicates envy and that there is someone spying on his life. Seeing someone in a dream with intertwined and unrelated symbols and images Understood or known is evidence of envy. One of the signs that indicate the presence of envy is when the dreamer sees a grave or a camera or sees a picture of a person with an animal in the picture. Envy in a dream for a married woman. There are some signs that indicate envy.

title: Interpretation of incense in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman

preview.html: To dream of incense in a dream, to see incense sticks, to evaporate incense and incense, buy or burn, to light and smell the good scent of incense for the unmarried young man, the married man, the single woman, the married man. Pregnant and divorced women as well, and more interpretations in the continuation of the topic below. Incense in a dream is one of the distinctive dreams that we see in a dream and it brings us joy and happiness if we see it in a dream, as incense is one of the beautiful things that we see in life and that we take and place in the home to absorb the beautiful scent and delicate scents. And help in changing the look and smell of the house. The translator Ibn Sirin, the interpreter of dreams, interpreted the meaning of seeing incense in a dream, which carries many important meanings and associations that reach the dreamer, who must be very careful. Interpretation of incense in a dream Incense in a dream indicates a good person who will give you good advice. . Whoever dreams that he is carrying incense in his hand, and he is one of those who lost something, he will recover it and hear kind words. Whoever inhales the scent of an incense stick or sees its smoke in a dream, he will receive good news. And whoever sees incense in his house, he will be blessed with a child, and after that he will be a master among his people, or A guardian from their guardians, i.e. a ruler, a teacher, or an imam. Incense in a dream is interpreted as money from a person of great value, with a good life, good memory, and good behavior, and fumigation is said to be a good life. Seeing incense burning in a dream is a praiseworthy vision It indicates livelihood. Incense incense in a dream means hearing good, happy, and cheerful news, God willing, Blessed and Almighty. Seeing incense in a dream on a specific occasion means that sometimes I can see it on an occasion at home or at work. Light incense. This vision shows the end of problems. It seems that the owner of this vision at the same time has problems, but when she sees this vision, it indicates the end of these problems. Seeing incense for a married woman indicates abundant livelihood, and it is said that she will be happy in the coming period. There will be some happy moments. It is said that this vision means that there is family stability for this woman. Seeing incense or incense in a dream is about a married man. This vision shows reconciliation with a person with whom I have a disagreement. It means seeing incense in a dream, and I am a married man in reality, but there is a man who is quarreling with someone, and this vision seeing burning incense indicates reconciliation between me and the person with whom I disagree. Smelling the pleasant scent of incense in a dream indicates On the good and happy news that you will hear in the coming period, God willing. Seeing frankincense for an unmarried young man indicates marriage. As for seeing the smell of its smoke for a man or the smell of incense for a married man, this indicates an increase in money. Seeing incense in a dream indicates good luck, success, excellence, ending disputes, alleviating worries, and alleviating circumstances in a way. The year of incense is one of the good visions in dreams or dreams. Seeing a girl who loves the smell of incense in a dream is evidence of the good that is coming her way. And the girl who sees people around her in a dream and who loved the dreamer

title: Interpretation of the message in a dream

preview.html: Meanings of the message in a dream. Thus, the encyclopedia presented an article on the interpretation of the message in a dream. The meaning of seeing a letter in a dream for a single woman is not the same as the meaning of a letter in a dream for a married woman, and the meaning of seeing a letter for a pregnant woman differs from its connotations and interpretation. It also differs depending on the type of that letter, whether this letter is paper or not, or whether it is an email or a letter. Textual, interpretation also varies. This message? Therefore, together, we know the interpretation of the message in a dream in all these cases. Interpretation of the message in a dreamInterpretation of the message in a dream in NabulsiNabulsi is one of the most famous dream interpreters. Interpret the message in the dream as a sign of good luck that will accompany the dreamer. If a person sees that someone has sent him a message in a dream. This is evidence that this person is waiting for good news, and it is not required that the sender be a relative, friend, or stranger, and the content of this message also does not matter, and if the person receives a text message in a dream. This is evidence that this person must advance an important issue in his life. Because this will be followed by happy news. It will make a person's life stable and satisfied, and if a person sees in a dream that he has received a long message from someone and there is no friendship or affection between him and that person. This is evidence that the dreamer is going through a difficult stage in his life. It makes his life unstable and shows that preparing for that period should be possible. This is evidence that the monarch and this person have love and affection for each other, and that there is a relationship of understanding and intimacy between them that does not exist in others. Interpretation of the message in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets text messages on a smartphone as evidence that God will give him good news soon, whether that news is related to work Or his life of marriage, engagement, etc. Some may say how Ibn Sirin interpreted this interpretation. Ancient commentators, in their time there were no smartphones and other modern media. I say: Ibn Sirin used analogy in his interpretation (Analogy: He measured the interpretation of letters written on a topic similar to it or close to it according to ancient hermeneutic scholars. Ibn Sirin also interpreted e-mail in a dream as evidence that the slanderer is busy with many things, which means that seeing an e-mail is Self-talk, as he said, is recognized by psychologists, but if someone sees that someone from his relatives or friends has sent a message via email, this is evidence that the dreamer will meet one of his old friends or with one of his relatives whom he has not seen since A long period. Interpretation of the message in a dream for married people, pregnant women, and widows. The message in the dream carries a sign of goodness and blessing for each of these three. If a married woman sees the message in a dream, this is evidence that God Almighty will grant her goodness and blessing in her life, and will grant her success in managing the affairs of her home, and that her life. She is stable and raises her children well. As for seeing a pregnant woman in a dream, it is also evidence of waiting for good news

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing jihad in a dream and its meaning in detail

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing jihad in a dream varies depending on the means used in jihad, such as the sword. The interpretation also varies according to the dreamer, whether he is a man, single, or married. Or a pregnant woman. We will deal with the interpretation of this dream in detail as follows: Interpretation of seeing jihad in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that if a person strives for the sake of God and His religion, whether by action or words in a dream, to raise the name and status of God Almighty, and to take care of his country and the people of his place. He has a good gesture, as this vision indicates an abundance of sustenance, and the efforts of the visionary to protect his family, relatives, and friends show his success in caring for them and protecting them from all bad and evil. Also, seeing jihad in a dream is a sign of happiness, the spaciousness of life, the removal of worries and problems, getting rid of the problems that exist in life, and preventing one from progressing and excelling. But if the dreamer sees himself retreating from jihad for the sake of God Almighty, then this is a bad omen for him, as it is It indicates his bad morals and lack of concern for his family and their protection. Interpretation of the vision of jihad for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is fighting for the sake of God and His religion to defeat the enemies of God and support Islam and the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, then this is evidence of her goodness. Etiquette and obedience to God Almighty and His faithful Messenger. It is also a sign of happiness and prosperity, relieving her from hardships and hardships in her life and overcoming her enemies and opponents in her real life, God willing, especially if she was fighting with a sword against God’s enemies in her dream, and God knows best. The best.Interpretation of the vision of jihad for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is fighting for the sake of God Almighty and His Noble Messenger, then this is a sign of her complete obedience to God Almighty, and the complete fulfillment of her duties. . It is also a sign of the improvement of her relationship with her husband and his family, the disappearance of problems, worries, and heartaches, the abandonment of financial and family problems, and also indicates the ability to live, have financial stability, and improve her life. Her life and the life of her husband, God willing. Interpretation of the vision of jihad for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is fighting for the sake of God and His religion, Islam, then this is a sign of her good obedience to God Almighty and her safety from all evil, evil, and the destruction of problems. And the difficulties that she is going through in her life, God Almighty willing. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we will take your comments at the bottom of the article and we will provide you with the explanation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing pineapple in a dream: Eating pineapple in a dream

preview.html: Pineapple fruit for an unmarried girl, for a pregnant woman, for a married woman, whether she cuts, buys tree juice, eats by Ibn Sirin. A pineapple in a dream symbolizes your high self-confidence and that you have a strong personality. This dream also means that your personal life will change in the near future. You will meet someone and your relationship will succeed, so be Optimistic for the best. Pineapple in a dream symbolizes broad ambition in your career and success in your social relationships. If you are married, this dream symbolizes daily problems or pressures that you face greatly. The connotations it carries are the desire to relax, take a vacation, or stop working hard. Therefore, try to organize your time and find time to rest amidst your fast lifestyle. Drinking juice in a dream if you are single means that you are losing control of some major issues in your life. If you are married, this indicates problems with your partner that you are afraid to face. But if you offer this juice to your children or guests, the meaning is very positive because it means that you will get a living soon. Like picking a pineapple or eating it in pieces, this is a positive thing because it shows success in a job that you are tired of completing. A pineapple in a dream is a blessing and seeing a pineapple in a dream is a very good omen and you will succeed in the near future if you collect or eat all this fruit in the dream and if you cut Your finger while preparing a pineapple for food, you will worry about things that will soon become a source of happiness and success for you. Seeing a pineapple in your dream represents confidence, ambition, success and that you are confident in yourself and your steps. Pineapple can also symbolize good hospitality. It may mean that you need to relax or take Vacation: Eating pineapple indicates sexual problems and loss of control over some matters. He is always protected by his work friends, the neighborhood, or the neighbors and is always letting go and respected. Sometimes this vision can express a start on the path of travel and tourism work. It indicates going through events full of goodness, achieving goodness and obtaining benefit and goodness from them. There will be many wonderful events that bring happiness and joy to the dreamer, and the dreamer will witness the happiness and joy of those he loves and share this happiness with. It indicates receiving good and joyful news. It also indicates the acceptance of a person’s prayers and the opening of the doors of luck to him. It indicates that the person will be forced to buy a new house, so he will move away from the place in which he lives and suffer from missing it. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about honey for a woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about honey for a married woman: Honey is a delicious food, and seeing it in a dream has many interpretations and meanings, such as that which expresses goodness, good luck, happy news, and others that only bring problems, judgments, and bad luck. Details attached to honey in a dream in the next article. Interpretation of a dream about honey for a married woman. Interpretation scholars have explained many of the meanings and connotations associated with seeing honey in a dream for a married woman, which are as follows: If the dreamer is married and sees honey in her dream, this is clear evidence of the emergence of major positive developments in her life. In all aspects, it makes her better than she was before. If the wife sees honey in her dream, this is clear evidence that she is living a married life dominated by security and tranquility, full of luxury and living, which leads to improving her psychological conditions. Interpretation of a dream about honey in a dream for a married woman suffering from an illness that leads to Complete recovery of health and well-being in the near future. If the wife had honey in her dream and in reality she is going through financial hardship, the dream indicates the recovery of her financial situation and her ability to return the money to its owners. Seeing honey for a married woman in a dream indicates her closeness to God, and her preservation of Reciting the Qur’an and the five daily prayers, and participating in many charitable works. Interpretation of a dream about honey for a married woman by Ibn Sirin Happy events, which lead to her joy and happiness. If a married woman does not give birth and sees honey in her dream, then God Almighty will bless her with good offspring. If a married woman sees honey in her dream, this is a clear indication of the end of heartache and the end of all the difficult times that she went through in her life in The coming period. Interpretation of a dream about eating adulterated honey in a dream for a married woman symbolizes that she is suffering from successive sorrows due to disappointment, which leads to increased psychological pressure on her. Seeing pure honey in a dream for a married woman symbolizes intelligence, prudence, and the ability to manage her life’s affairs in the correct way and with care. With her family to the fullest. Interpretation of a dream about honey for a pregnant woman. There are many connotations and visions related to seeing a dream about honey in a pregnant woman’s dream, which are as follows: If a pregnant woman sees honey in her dream, then the months of pregnancy will pass quietly without problems, problems, and health crises with great ease in the birth process, and she and her baby will be happy. In complete health and well-being. If a pregnant woman suffers from serious ill health and dreams that she is eating treacle in the morning, this is a clear indication that she will wear a dress of luxury in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about eating treacle in a dream for a pregnant woman symbolizes her husband obtaining a prominent position in It works and many benefit from it. If a pregnant woman dreams of honey and ghee, this is a clear indication that her circumstances will calm down and positive changes will occur.

title: Seeing unknown people in a dream

preview.html: Some consider it bad, and in some interpretations it has a meaning, and the interpretation depends on who are the people being seen and we will then present to you the most important things that have been said on the subject of seeing unknown people in a dream. Seeing unknown people in a dream There are more than one interpretations and evidence about seeing unknown people in a dream. . Among these interpretations are the following: Such as when you see strangers and unknown people in a dream. This dream shows that the dreamer is confused and anxious and symbolizes his inability to make the right decisions about certain aspects of his life. And if one sees unknown people in his dream, they are talking to him. It indicates This dream indicates that there is a major financial crisis that this person is going through and that he will lose a lot of his money in the coming days. Seeing strangers in the dream and the person was going through a big problem. This dream indicates that this person has large debts, and that he will be able to pay them all in the coming days. The dreamer sees in a dream unknown people walking with him in a group. This dream is mostly an indication that he will hear good news in the future or that comfort will come to him soon. You may be interested: Seeing unknown people in a dream for single women. Seeing unknown people in a dream for single women when Someone sees unknown people in a dream, then this vision shows the following: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is sitting with unknown people. This dream has a great significance for the difference in some things in her life, and a change in circumstances in many of her decisions in the future. And seeing a woman A single woman in her dream is that she is talking with strangers in her home. This dream indicates great goodness coming her way, God willing. A woman seeing herself alone in a dream is that she is sitting in her home and strangers are coming to her with a large gift. This dream indicates the imminent date of her engagement or marriage to a person with good qualities. Hasna will be happy with him and her life with him. An unmarried woman may see in a dream that she is walking with people she does not know and who have ugly faces. This dream indicates that something bad may happen to this girl and she approaches her, and she must beware of friendships around her. Seeing unfamiliar people In a dream for a married woman: There are many interpretations of seeing a married woman in a dream, with unknowns and strangers in it, and these interpretations are as follows: If a married woman dreams that her husband returns home accompanied by strangers. This dream indicates that there are good things that will happen in her life and the life of her husband. It indicates This dream also indicates that the family situation will change from worse to better. Seeing a married woman in a dream is that she is talking and speaking with strangers for long periods of time. This dream has an interpretation that this woman will get rid of the problems that surround her one by one. And if she sees a married woman in a dream That strangers are attacking her home and harming her family. This dream indicates corruption of one of her children or something bad happening to her while she is pregnant with a new baby. Some may interpret it as a kind of envy of her from the people closest to her. We chose for you: The interpretation of seeing someone who I do not know who loves me in... H

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about the engagement of a woman who is not her husband in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about the engagement of a woman who is not her husband in a dream from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of a woman who is not her husband in a dream. At first glance, it seems strange for a married woman to see herself getting engaged in a dream again, especially if it is to a man other than her husband. What is the significance of this vision? What does that mean exactly? This vision has many connotations that vary based on certain details and considerations, and what concerns us in this article is to list all the cases and connotations that dream of a married woman’s engagement without her husband. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s engagement without her husband. Seeing engagement in a dream represents piety, purity, justice, useful work, clear thinking, and walking on a path. The path and following the right path. If a married woman sees that she is dreaming, this means that she will become pregnant in the near future, if she is qualified for it. But if she sees that she is engaged to someone other than her husband, this symbolizes entering into a new business or partnership, or starting to implement some plans. Which was previously planned and benefited from the material and moral benefits. If she proposes marriage to him as an old man or a great person, this indicates that he will benefit greatly, especially in the matters of her life and how to manage her affairs and her private affairs, as she will gain many experiences from him and benefit from his advice and admonition to her. If she saw the engagement of a single woman and was very happy, this may be a reflection of her daughter’s engagement in the coming days, full preparation and readiness for everything big and small and the beginning of preparation for all the requirements of the coming period to make things seem perfect. From a psychological point of view, this vision could be an indication of a feeling With emotional emptiness or loss of interest and care, which prompts her to seek shelter outside her home. And if she sees that she is buying an engagement ring, this expresses the final decision on something that exhausted her thinking and caused her insomnia for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s engagement without her husband by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that Seeing an engagement indicates the world and the desire for it, indulging in many worldly endeavors and projects, and the presence of a degree of pressure makes one lose their nerves. If a married woman sees the engagement of someone other than her husband, it symbolizes a new adventure or experience through which she seeks to secure her future and the next period of her life. She tries in every possible way to get the position she deserves. This vision also expresses the great benefit that she will reap sooner or later, achieving some success in his field, good judgment on things, insight and knowledge of all aspects of the scene. Ibn Sirin goes on to say that a woman’s engagement without her husband in a dream indicates decline and great difficulty or difficulty. A heavy loss befalls the husband and exposes his dignity and status to degradation that negatively affects marital life and life affairs. Seeing a married woman participating in a dream indicates the many developments that she sees in her life at the present time and the changes that push her to acquire ideas and beliefs that suit the circumstances of the current moment. In the case of Not knowing who is proposing to her is humiliating

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person sitting on the carpet in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person sitting on a prayer rug in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of seeing a dead person sitting on a prayer rug in a dream, it is one of the very disturbing dreams, and for this reason they are looking for an interpretation of these dreams, but the reader must be forbidden and completely disbelieved; Because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth. They can make mistakes and they can be wrong, in addition to that the website and its managers have nothing to do with interpretations. The interpretation of seeing a dead person sitting on the carpet in a dream. Seeing a dead person praying on a prayer rug indicates the great status of God, Blessed and Most High, and God knows best. Whoever sees his place is that the dead person is praying, It can refer to the beneficial deeds that the deceased did in his life with the grace of God. Seeing the deceased sitting on the prayer rug in a dream may indicate the ways of kindness that the deceased left for his family with the grace of God. In the event that you see the deceased sitting on the prayer rug to pray, this may indicate rewards. The many good deeds and good deeds that will come to the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. Interpretation of seeing the dead asking for forgiveness from the living in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that the dead asked him to forgive him, it is possible that he needed charity at that time, and God knows best. The request of the living may indicate From the dead to ask forgiveness for his need to pray in those days. Anyone who sees in a dream that the deceased was asking the living to forgive him, may indicate the difficulties that the dreamer may face in his life at that time, and he must ask for God’s help. The dream of the dead Asking forgiveness from the living may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the deceased buying new clothes for himself in a dream Seeing the deceased buying new clothes in a dream may indicate the cover that the dreamer gains during this period, thanks to God. It may indicate The dream of a deceased person who presents the dreamer with new clothes indicates the abundance of money that the dreamer obtains at that time, thanks to God. If the deceased sees that the deceased was buying new clothes, this may indicate the blessings that he enjoyed, and God knows best. To see yourself buying new clothes in a dream It may indicate good things to come and happiness that will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about burying the dead inside the house in a dream: In the event that a person sees the deceased buried inside the house, this can indicate that the dreamer is traveling or working far from his family. The dream Burying the dead inside the house in a dream may indicate a wedding date or upcoming joy for the people of the house, thanks to God. If you see in a dream burying the deceased inside the house and the people of the house are crying, this may indicate changes that are occurring in the lives of the people of the house at that time and they must ask God's help. . If a person sees burying the dead inside the house in a dream, this may indicate the problems that the people of the house faced at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the deceased sad and crying in a dream: It is possible that it is a vision.
